name: Rock Paper Scissors: Mega Hyper Intense Tournament Battles
name_original: Rock Paper Scissors: Mega Hyper Intense Tournament Battles
description:
Rock Paper Scissors: Mega Hyper Intense Tournament Battles is a strategy game developed by Black Majic. It came out on 03-05-2015.
You can play Rock Paper Scissors: Mega Hyper Intense Tournament Battles on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
